ygData.subject: RE: Bard Equipment Question
ygData.msgSnippet: same here.  it s actually ac12 with 20CR/FR.  very nice stats i think, especially for no graphic and not plate like the SSB.  i couldn t bear the exe hood
ygData.messageBody:
same here. it's actually ac12 with 20CR/FR. very nice stats i think,
especially for no graphic and not plate like the SSB. i couldn't bear the
exe hood graphic either, though plate is exponentially worse.

i have sold a SSB for 500pp i believe, i have seen them as high as 800pp (a
long time ago) and 400pp is just about average now.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


> I only wear the Crown of Frogluk
> Kings because
> I refuse to wear a plate helm, being a female wood elf, and the Crown
> has no Graphic. I wore an Exectuioner's Hood before the Crown, and it
> also has very nice stats and is relatively easy to get. For a bard, I
> think I'd prefer the Hood, but I think for the price you paid for the
> barbute, that was a real win, and certainly a great upgrade
> from steel.
